oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Repeat Breeder Syndrome and its Associated Risk Factors in Québec Dairy Cows
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Filteau, Virginie
Bouchard, Émile
Bigras-Poulin, Michel
DuTremblay, Denis
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: repeat breeder syndrome
reproductive performance
risk factors
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The repeat breeder syndrome has a major impact on herd reproductive performance. In Quebec, reproductive problems are the most important causes of culling in the dairy industry. The objective of this study was to evaluate the occurrence and the risk factors associated with the repeat breeder syndrome (RBS) in Quebec dairy cows and heifers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1999; 242-243
